title: Server outage due to misconfigured ACL
description: The main production server went down because access control lists were misconfigured, preventing critical services from starting.
actions_taken: Adjusted ACLs, restarted services, monitored uptime for 24 hours.

title: Database connection pool exhaustion
description: High traffic volume led to the exhaustion of available database connections, causing 500 errors across the site.
actions_taken: Increased pool size, implemented aggressive timeout logic.
outcome: Site stability restored; permanent fix deployed in v2.4.

title: SSL Certificate expiration
description: The public-facing API was unreachable because the SSL certificate expired without triggering a renewal alert.
actions_taken: Manually renewed certificate, updated Certbot configuration.

title: DDoS attack on load balancer
description: A distributed denial of service attack targeted the main ingress controller, causing high latency.
actions_taken: Enabled Cloudflare under-attack mode, blocked malicious IP ranges.
outcome: Traffic normalized after 45 minutes of mitigation.

title: Storage volume capacity reached
description: The logging server stopped processing events because the root partition was 100% full.
actions_taken: Purged old log files, expanded EBS volume size.

title: Memory leak in Auth Microservice
description: Gradual memory consumption increase led to OOM kills every 4 hours in the authentication pod.
actions_taken: Profiled heap memory, identified unclosed stream, patched code.

title: Stripe Webhook signature failure
description: Payment confirmations failed due to an incorrect secret key update in the environment variables.
actions_taken: Updated secret key in Vault, redeployed service.
outcome: Replayed missed webhooks to sync transactions.

title: Redis Cache eviction surge
description: Latency increased in the dashboard because Redis began evicting keys frequently.
actions_taken: Increased Redis instance memory, switched to volatile-lru policy.

title: DNS propagation delay after migration
description: Users in specific regions reported intermittent connectivity following a nameserver update.
actions_taken: Lowered TTL values, verified records with Dig.

title: Zombie processes on Jenkins worker
description: CI/CD builds were failing because the worker node reached its maximum process limit.
actions_taken: Killed defunct processes, updated cleanup script.
outcome: Build pipeline restored to normal operation.

title: Unauthorized login attempts from unknown IP
description: Brute force attempts detected on the admin portal originating from multiple proxies.
actions_taken: Implemented rate limiting and mandatory MFA for admin accounts.

title: S3 Bucket policy leak
description: An internal data bucket was accidentally set to public read access.
actions_taken: Changed bucket policy to private, audited access logs.
outcome: No sensitive data was accessed by unauthorized parties.

title: Kafka Consumer group lag
description: Data processing fell behind by 2 million records due to a slow consumer process.
actions_taken: Increased partition count and added more consumer instances.

title: Elasticsearch cluster yellow status
description: One node failed, leaving unassigned shards in the search cluster.
actions_taken: Restarted failed node, forced shard reallocation.

title: Broken CSS on landing page
description: A deployment error caused the minified CSS file to be corrupted.
actions_taken: Rolled back to previous stable build.

title: SMTP relay timeout
description: Outbound emails (password resets) were being queued but not sent.
actions_taken: Verified SMTP credentials, whitelisted new relay IP.

title: Docker daemon crash
description: The Docker service on the staging host crashed due to an incompatible kernel update.
actions_taken: Reverted kernel version, restarted Docker.

title: API Rate limit exceeded for Maps SDK
description: Interactive maps failed to load because the monthly quota was hit early.
actions_taken: Upgraded tier in Google Cloud Console.

title: PostgreSQL deadlock in transaction
description: A race condition in the order processing logic caused database deadlocks.
actions_taken: Refactored transaction order, optimized index.

title: VPN gateway disconnect
description: Remote employees couldn't access internal resources due to a VPN tunnel collapse.
actions_taken: Rebooted VPN gateway, updated firmware.

title: CDN Cache Poisoning
description: An attacker manipulated header values to cache incorrect responses globally.
actions_taken: Purged CDN cache, implemented header validation.

title: Kubelet service failure
description: A node became 'NotReady' because the Kubelet service stopped responding.
actions_taken: SSH'd into node, restarted Kubelet, checked systemd logs.
outcome: Node rejoined cluster and pods rescheduled.

title: GitLab Runner disk full
description: Builds were failing due to leftover Docker volumes taking up space.
actions_taken: Executed 'docker system prune', automated weekly cleanup.

title: Nginx 502 Bad Gateway
description: The reverse proxy could not reach the upstream Python application.
actions_taken: Restarted Gunicorn workers, adjusted socket permissions.

title: MongoDB Replica Set split-brain
description: Network partition caused two nodes to claim primary status.
actions_taken: Re-configured arbitration, forced re-election.
outcome: Data consistency maintained, single primary established.

title: Frontend JS bundle size spike
description: A new dependency increased the main bundle size by 400%, slowing TTI.
actions_taken: Removed dependency, used lightweight alternative.

title: IAM Role permission missing
description: Lambda function failed to write to DynamoDB due to a missing 'PutItem' permission.
actions_taken: Updated IAM policy to include DynamoDB permissions.

title: RabbitMQ Queue overflow
description: Message queue reached 1 million messages, causing high RAM usage.
actions_taken: Scaled consumers, purged dead-letter queue.

title: SSH Brute force from Botnet
description: High volume of SSH login attempts detected on port 22.
actions_taken: Changed SSH port, enabled Fail2Ban.

title: Slow Query on Users table
description: Search by email was taking >2 seconds due to missing index.
actions_taken: Added B-Tree index on email column.

title: Corrupt Cron job script
description: Nightly backups failed because the shell script contained a syntax error.
actions_taken: Fixed shell script, ran manual backup.

title: Third-party API downtime (Slack)
description: Internal notifications were not appearing in Slack due to Slack API outage.
actions_taken: Checked status.slack.com, informed team.
outcome: Notifications resumed once Slack fixed the issue.

title: Broken Image links in production
description: Asset migration led to incorrect URL paths for user avatars.
actions_taken: Ran SQL script to update image paths in DB.

title: High CPU on Analytics Engine
description: An unoptimized regex caused a CPU spike on the processing nodes.
actions_taken: Rewrote regex to avoid backtracking, redeployed service.

title: Firewall blocking internal traffic
description: The staging env couldn't talk to the production DB after a security group change.
actions_taken: Modified Security Group rules to allow specific CIDR ranges.

title: Node.js EventEmitter leak
description: Websocket server crashed after 48 hours due to too many listeners.
actions_taken: Added 'removeListener' calls, increased MaxListeners temporarily.

title: Prometheus scraping failure
description: Metrics were missing for the billing service after a port change.
actions_taken: Updated Prometheus config to target the correct port.

title: Invalid JSON in ConfigMap
description: Pod failed to start because the mounted JSON config was malformed.
actions_taken: Corrected JSON syntax in Kubernetes ConfigMap.

title: Search index lag
description: New products weren't appearing in search results for 10 minutes.
actions_taken: Optimized Elasticsearch refresh interval.
outcome: Search results now update within 1 second.

title: Zabbix agent down
description: The monitoring agent on the mail server stopped reporting metrics.
actions_taken: Restarted zabbix-agent service, checked connectivity.

title: Orphaned AWS Snapshots costs
description: Cloud bill spiked due to 500+ unattached EBS snapshots.
actions_taken: Ran cleanup script to delete snapshots older than 30 days.

title: Python version mismatch
description: The application failed to start because it was using Python 3.8 features on a 3.7 host.
actions_taken: Updated Dockerfile to use Python 3.10 image.

title: Malformed CSV upload crash
description: A user uploaded a CSV with special characters that crashed the parser.
actions_taken: Added UTF-8 validation and error handling to parser.
outcome: System now returns 400 Bad Request instead of crashing.

title: Intermittent Wi-Fi in Office B
description: Staff reported drops in connection during video calls.
actions_taken: Performed site survey, moved access point to avoid interference.

title: Jenkins master OOM
description: The CI master node ran out of heap space during concurrent builds.
actions_taken: Increased JVM heap size to 4GB, optimized build history retention.

title: Expired API Key for Twilio
description: SMS 2FA messages were not being sent to users.
actions_taken: Rotated API keys and updated environment secrets.

title: BGP Route flapping
description: Regional ISP issue caused the data center to lose connectivity intermittently.
actions_taken: Switched traffic to secondary ISP via BGP priority adjustment.

title: Grafana Dashboard slow load
description: Dashboards with 30-day time ranges were timing out.
actions_taken: Implemented data downsampling in InfluxDB.

title: Docker image registry error
description: Unable to pull images due to 'Too Many Requests' from Docker Hub.
actions_taken: Configured image pull-through cache and authenticated login.

title: Logstash parsing error
description: Logs from the new firewall were not being indexed correctly.
actions_taken: Updated Grok patterns in Logstash config.
outcome: Firewall logs now searchable in Kibana.
